info.name: Nigerian Real Estate Scraper API - Complete Collection
info.description:
Nigerian Real Estate API - v3.2.3 with Firestore Fix + Performance Optimizations

91 endpoints across 8 categories

LATEST (Dec 18, 2025):
- Fixed Firestore data retrieval (0% â†’ 100% success)
- Batch uploads available (10x faster, opt-in)
- Faster detail scraping (30% improvement)

request.description: Start scraping with specified sites and configuration
Get current scraping status with batch information and timing
Get history of all scraping runs
Get list of all configured sites (51 sites)
Get configuration for a specific site
Add a new site to configuration
Get scraper logs with optional filtering by level
Get logs for a specific site
List all available data files from exports folder
Get property data from a specific site with pagination
Search across all properties in master data
Get aggregate statistics across all sites
Get summary statistics for a filtered query
Get current rate limit status for geocoding and external APIs
Check if specific number of requests can be made
Get price history for a specific property
Find properties with significant price drops
Find properties that haven't been updated in X days
Create a new saved search with optional notifications
Execute a saved search and get results
Get statistics for a saved search
Check health status of a specific site
Get active health alerts and warnings
Detect duplicate properties using fuzzy matching
Calculate quality score for a property (0-100%)
Get dashboard stats: total properties, sites, price ranges, property types
Get cheapest properties sorted by price
Get newest properties added in the last X days
Advanced multi-criteria search across all Firestore properties
Get all properties from a specific site
Get single property by unique hash ID
Get statistics for a specific site
Filter by furnishing: furnished, semi-furnished, unfurnished
Get properties sorted by view count
Get auto-tagged hot deals (<15M per bedroom)
Filter by specific area (Lekki, VI, Ikoyi, etc.)
Get recently listed properties (within X days)
Generate custom export file (CSV, JSON, Excel)
Get list of supported export formats
Trigger GitHub Actions scraping workflow (51 sites in parallel)
Get status of a specific workflow run
List recent GitHub Actions workflow runs
Get details of a specific scheduled job
Send a test email to verify configuration

Reload environment variables from .env file without restarting server.

Use this to update credentials (GitHub token, Firebase, etc.) with zero downtime.
